product_name: The North Face Orangahang Woven Shirt - Men's
long_description: Made with a lightweight cotton and polyester blend, The North Face Orangahang Woven shirt wears well in warm-weather climbing or for around-town explorations. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Underarm and side gussets allow good range of motion. Snap-front placket and chest pocket with snap closure.
short_description: Made with a lightweight cotton and polyester blend, The North Face Orangahang Woven shirt wears well in warm-weather climbing or for around-town explorations.
